intro: Psychotria sorsogonensis, commonly known as the Sorsogon Island Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Philippines, specifically found on the island of Sorsogon. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and shrublands. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially vulnerable species.
